params._alice: : Address representing user with function deposit
params._bob: : Address representing user with multisig deposit

getAlice().notice: A getter function for the bob of the multisig

getBob().notice: A getter function for the bob of the multisig

userdoc.notice: Contains logic to safely transfer channel assets (even if they are         noncompliant). During adjudication, balances from defunding the         channel or defunding transfers are registered as withdrawable. Once         they are registered, the owner (or a watchtower on behalf of the         owner), may call `exit` to reclaim funds from the multisig.
